New note by 有栖かずみ@C105 2日目(月) 東R-47a
OpenAuth
item.description: While there are many open source solutions for auth, almost all of them are libraries that are meant to be embedded into a single application. Centralized auth servers typically are delivered as SaaS services - eg Auth0 or Clerk.
